entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
